title: Greenhouse System Data Collection Module Design: Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental knowledge of electronics and programming, along with basic understanding of sensors/actuators
context.additional_context: A course aimed at learners composed of current practitioners, focusing on designing and implementing data collection modules for actual greenhouse systems using personal devices

learning_goals: Select various sensors (temperature, humidity, illuminance, etc.) required for greenhouse environment monitoring and implement a circuit design and data collection system.
Develop algorithms to process and log sensor data using microcontrollers (e.g., Arduino/Raspberry Pi).
Evaluate the performance of the developed system and propose improvement strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
